text: Ordered 2 four pieces of shrimp tempura and 28 piece sushi combo, but got delivered 6 pieces (instead of 8 pieces) of shrimp tempura with some extra sushi which I didn't want. They could've just called if they didn't have enough tempura, I would've just cancelled my order. I'm paying for extra tip and not even getting what I ordered. 3 stars for the sushi quality, but probably won't order again as I didn't get what I expected.

complete scam. they sent our salmon rolls with most of the pieces having no salmon at all. complained and they did nothing to fix it. literally every sushi place in mtl is better than here. in fact, starving is better than eating here.

J'ai testé l'offre de livraison de sushis de ce restaurant grace au site internet just eat! Nous avons attendu un peu plus d'une heure pour réceptionner nos sushis....et le livreur m'a quasiment jeté mon plateau de sushis dans les bras!(on dira que ce comportement s'explique par le retard qu'il a accumulé pour ses courses) Les sushis sont installés sur un plateau et la présentation est alléchante!  Ils ne sont pas meilleurs ou moins bons qu'ailleurs...il s'agit d'une qualité normale pour des sushis en livraison!  Pour vous faire une idée de la gamme de prix pratiquée.....pour 3 bons mangeurs....un plateau de 65 morceaux vous en coûtera 54$ (prix de juillet 2017)et il vous restera certainement un peu de rab pour un lunch!

Don't order from here, maki are sized like hosomakis (half the size), fish looks expensive so if you can somehow find it in your sushi you're lucky.  Don't be fooled by good reviews it's impossible this place can serve something good.  Hot rice no fish mono sushi
Best sushi ever. I went there with my friends and we loved the food and the service and we will definitely be back again!
Just look at the pictures and you will understand. Do not order from them. The ones I am holding came like this. I didnt squish them or anything
